sims 0.0.0.9018
  • Reference

Simulated Data Argument Values

sims_info.Rd

Gets the simulated data argument values in the '.sims.rds' file.

sims_info(path = ".")

Arguments

path

A string of the path to the directory with the simulated data.

Value

A named list of the values in file.path(path, '.sims.rds').

Examples

set.seed(10)
sims_simulate("a ~ dunif(0,1)", path = tempdir(), exists = NA, ask = FALSE)
#> $a
#> [1] 0.1354862
#> 
#> an nlists object of an nlist object with 1 natomic element
sims_info(tempdir())
#> $code
#> [1] "model{a ~ dunif(0,1)}\n"
#> 
#> $constants
#> an nlist object with 0 natomic elements
#> 
#> $parameters
#> an nlist object with 0 natomic elements
#> 
#> $monitor
#> [1] "a"
#>
